ingredients.content: 20 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces (2 cm)
1 - 2 fresh red chillies, hot, deseeded and halved, to taste
70 g bacon, cured and smoked, sliced, cut in strips
100 - 120 g penne pasta (or other short dried pasta)

preparations.content: Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic and chilli in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add bacon, tomatoes, oil and salt then cook <b>7 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add water and pasta then cook <b>select time according to packet instructions/98°C//speed 0.5<b> or until al dente.
Stir in half of the grated Parmesan, then season and serve sprinkled with remaining grated Parmesan.
